channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat -- Red Hat Virtualization Engine 4.4
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Red Hat -- Red Hat Virtualization Engine 4.4

item.title: CVE-2024-0822|2024-08-19T13:45:35.202Z -- red%20hat -- red%20hat%20virtualization%20engine%204.4
item.description: An authentication bypass vulnerability was found in overt-engine. This flaw allows the creation of users in the system without authentication due to a flaw in the CreateUserSession command.
